com.google.api.ads.dfp.lib

Class ServiceAccountant

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.api.ads.dfp.lib.ServiceAccountant

  • public class ServiceAccountant
extends java.lang.Object
    The ServiceAccountant class acts as an accountant for metrics extracted from the request and response from a SOAP call. From DfpHttpSender, the method handleRequest(Message), or handleResponse(String, OperationDesc, String, Message, String) are called.
    Author:
    api.arogal@gmail.com (Adam Rogal)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServiceAccountant(DfpUser user)
      Constructor to set the user of the service accountant which will be used to record properties such as the effective client and the environment that the request went against.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getLastOperationCount()
      Returns the number of operations executed by the last request issued through this service instance or null if the last number of operations not recorded successfully.
      java.lang.String getLastRequestId()
      Returns the unique ID that identifies last request issued through this service instance or null if the last number request ID was not recorded successfully.
      long getLastResponseTime()
      Returns the time it took to execute the last request issued through this service instance or null if the last request time was not recorded successfully.
      ServiceAccountantRecord getLastServiceAccountantRecord()
      Returns the last ServiceAccountantRecord handled by this accountant.
      long getTotalOperationCount()
      Returns the total number of operations executed by all requests issued through this service instance.
      long getTotalResponseTime()
      Returns the total time it took to execute all requests issued through this service instance.
      long getTotalUnitCount()
      Returns the total number of API units consumed by all requests issued through this service instance.
      void handleRequest(org.apache.axis.Message soapMessage)
      Handles the request from the SOAP call by extracting the sanitized XML from the Message.
      ServiceAccountantRecord handleResponse(java.lang.String service, org.apache.axis.description.OperationDesc operation, java.lang.String server, org.apache.axis.Message soapMessage, java.lang.String faultMessage)
      Handles the XML response by extracting metrics from the SOAP header, recording those metrics to the DfpServiceLogger.REQUEST_INFO_LOG and writing the response XML to the DfpServiceLogger.SOAP_XML_LOG.
      void resetCounters()
      Resets the header counters including operations, units, time, and request Id.

        public long getLastResponseTime()
        Returns the time it took to execute the last request issued through this service instance or null if the last request time was not recorded successfully.
        Returns:
        elapsed time between the web service receiving last request and sending the response, in milliseconds

      • getTotalResponseTime

        public long getTotalResponseTime()
        Returns the total time it took to execute all requests issued through this service instance.
        Returns:
        total elapsed time between the web service receiving all requests and sending all responses, in milliseconds

        Returns the number of operations executed by the last request issued through this service instance or null if the last number of operations not recorded successfully.
        Returns:
        number of operations in the last request

        public long getTotalOperationCount()
        Returns the total number of operations executed by all requests issued through this service instance.
        Returns:
        total number of operations in all requests

      • getTotalUnitCount

        public long getTotalUnitCount()
        Returns the total number of API units consumed by all requests issued through this service instance.
        Returns:

        Returns:

      • getLastServiceAccountantRecord

        public ServiceAccountantRecord getLastServiceAccountantRecord()
        Returns the last ServiceAccountantRecord handled by this accountant.
        Returns:
        the last ServiceAccountantRecord

      • handleRequest

        public void handleRequest(org.apache.axis.Message soapMessage)
        Handles the request from the SOAP call by extracting the sanitized XML from the Message. Logs the sanitized SOAP XML to the DfpServiceLogger.SOAP_XML_LOG logger. If the SOAP XML could not be sanitized because of an AxisFault or ServiceException thrown while being processed, it is omitted from the logs.
        Parameters:
        soapMessage - the message from the SOAP call

      • handleResponse

        public ServiceAccountantRecord handleResponse(java.lang.String service,
                                     org.apache.axis.description.OperationDesc operation,
                                     java.lang.String server,
                                     org.apache.axis.Message soapMessage,
                                     java.lang.String faultMessage)
                                       throws javax.xml.soap.SOAPException,
                                              org.apache.axis.AxisFault
        Handles the XML response by extracting metrics from the SOAP header, recording those metrics to the DfpServiceLogger.REQUEST_INFO_LOG and writing the response XML to the DfpServiceLogger.SOAP_XML_LOG. If the XML cannot be processed or the header map could not be extracted, this method fails gracefully by not throwing the exceptions, but logging them in the DfpServiceLogger.DFP_API_LIB_LOG and returning a null.
        Parameters:
        service - the DFP service that was reached
        operation - the operation that Axis is currently handling
        server - the server the call was made against
        soapMessage - the XML response message
        faultMessage - the fault message
        Returns:
        a ServiceAccountantRecord of the response or null if the message could not be processed.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.soap.SOAPException - if the SOAP XML could not be extracted to a string
        org.apache.axis.AxisFault - if the SOAP header could not be extracted
